attributes.action: Strip Sir Fred Goodwin (former RBS Chief Executive) of his knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given that Sir Fred was awarded his knighthood for services to banking it seems fitting that he should be stripped of that title given the damage his policies have had on RBS and the UK economy.  

Stripping him of his knighthood would not help the UK economy, but he should not be allowed to benefit from his reckless actions in anyway.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Honours Committee.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
